name: IIBBSY Featured Image
details: The offseason and pre-season countdown timer. Currently build using ES5 JavaScript (no frameworks or libraries), the timer takes a human-readable date and time and compares it to the date and time when the user visits the site. When the code determines it is baseball season, the countdown is replaced with an emphatic "YES!"

name: IIBBSY Mobile
details: The scoreboard app, written in Ember.js, that displays the days games, their probable pitchers, and up-to-date game information as the games progress.
